resources.string: Please do not use any handheld device to operate this application while driving. Using a handheld device to operate this application while driving is dangerous and against the law in California.\n\nWe strive to make the information provided in this application as accurate as possible, but we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any information provided. Neither the City and County of San Francisco nor the maker of this application is liable for any damage or injury that occurs while operating this application.
